column10: 1955 to the late lorraine and ira jesse johnston. loving father
column12: brad is survived by two siblings: jill johnson and douglas johnston. his children: robert johnston and heather (rebekah) johnston. he is also survived by his grandchild: autumn johnston. a viewing and memorial service will be held at jenkins-soffe funeral home
column18: 2015 at 3pm (viewing to begin at 2pm). relatives and friends are welcome at his daughter's home after the memorial service. online condolences may be shared at www. jenkins-soffe. com. read bradley johnston's obituary and guestbook on jenkins-soffe. com. back to top guestbook. leave your condolence. post message. the highlight of our halloweens was always taking our young son up to brad's porch only to be scared by his booming voice over the pa system he had set up. our thoughts go out to his family and friends. collin barrett - about 10 hours ago back to top services. funeral home. jenkins-soffe mortuary-murray jenkins-soffe mortuary-murray4760 south state street. murray
